I liked to post this in NBW's forums, but the forums didn't admit 
this post so I'll post this here. This post will continue (If I'm not 
moderated for post too much OOC's, LOL) :)

RESEACH.

OBJETIVES.
Find out if an old look of website is the problem of low ratting in 
RPG. 
Discover if few characters number are affecting the number of the 
post in RPG. 
Discover if school or other factors are involved in low posting in 
RPG. 
Find out if more promotion will help to increase the number of active 
Rpgers. 
Find out if new stuff in Website will increase the interest in RPG.
 
TEORY.

Low posting in RPG is caused for several factors (social, scholar, 
interesting, etc.) that convened are decreasing the number of the 
posts and the interest of members. 

In order to discover that, the study will be descriptive, correlation 
and explicative for describe, explicate the situation and find the 
correlation among the factors and the phenomenon.
